title: Eye-Care Company Bausch & Lomb Files for IPO
sub_head: Bausch Health Cos. said in 2020 that it planned to spin off the eye-care business
body:
Bausch & Lomb Corp. has filed paperwork for its initial public offering, nearly a year and half after its parent company, Bausch Health Cos., said it would spin off the eye-care company.
The company said it plans to raise $100 million in its IPO, a placeholder figure companies often use to calculate filing fees and is often changed. It didnâ€™t disclose how many shares it intends to offer to the public, according to registration documents filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Thursday.
